file_intent: Interactive, searchable, sortable list UI component in React

responsibility_blocks.description: Debounce user input to minimize filtering recalculations and API calls
responsibility_blocks.label: Debounced search query handling

responsibility_blocks.description: Sort filtered results based on predefined SORT_OPTIONS
responsibility_blocks.label: Sorting of filtered items

responsibility_blocks.description: Track selected item and notify parent via onSelect callback
responsibility_blocks.label: Item selection management

responsibility_blocks.description: Clear search input and selection without unmounting component
responsibility_blocks.label: Search reset and state clearing

responsibility_blocks.description: Render error banner and dismiss action when error state is set
responsibility_blocks.label: Error rendering path

responsibility_blocks.description: Render search input, clear button, and sort select
responsibility_blocks.label: UI render: search controls

responsibility_blocks.description: Show result count when there is an active query
responsibility_blocks.label: UI render: result messaging

responsibility_blocks.description: Render list of items with selection state and accessibility attributes
responsibility_blocks.label: UI render: results listing
